translation: Fix your mind on Me, be devoted to Me, sacrifice to Me, bow down to Me. You will come to Me; I truly promise you this, for you are dear to Me.
commentary: 18.65 Manmanah with mind fixed on Me? Be be? My devotee devoted to Me? Madyaji sacrifice to Me? Me to Me? Namaskuru bow down? Me to Me? Eve even? Will you come (thou) shalt come? Truth truth? They to thee? Promise (I) promise? Dear: dear? Asi (thou) art? May of Me.Commentary Develop onepointedness of mind. Fix your thought on Me. If the mind wanders bring it again and again to the center or point or object
